TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlSetMarkupExtensionEventArgs extends System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetValueEventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for callbacks that are invoked when a XAML object writer sets a value using a markup extension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Although a class might indicate with <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute> that it handles all attempts to set a value through a markup extension, it might also use more than one markup extension to do so. Thus each set operation ultimately resolves to a separate markup extension implementation in the supporting code. The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionEventArgs> class reports the specifics of each attempted markup extension set operation so that the callback can branch accordingly for different <xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension>cases.

MemberSignature.Value: public XamlSetMarkupExtensionEventArgs (System.Xaml.XamlMember member, System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension value, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Xaml.XamlMember member, class System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension value, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed

Docs.param: XAML type system / schema information for the member being set.
The markup extension reference to provide for the member being set.
Service provider information passed to the markup extension.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CallBase() cil managed

Docs.summary: Provides a way to invoke a callback as defined on a base class of the current acting type.
Gets the reference that is relevant to this .
Docs.value: The markup extension reference that is relevant to this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this property is the construction `value` cast to <xref:System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension>.

Docs.summary: Gets service provider information that was passed to the markup extension.
Docs.value: Service provider information that was passed to the markup extension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this property is the `serviceProvider` constructor argument.
